title: HDFC Bank app gets updated for better bill payment experience
text:
HDFC Bank app gets updated for better bill payment experience 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
HDFC Bank, one of the leading private sector banks in India, have just updated their official app to v2.5.0.0. The latest update â€“ v2.4.0....
